bug.author: chuchienshu
bug.summary: Cannot reproduce your results on UCF101 dataset.
bug.description:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/avinashpaliwal>@avinashpaliwal</denchmark-link> , Thanks for sharing this awesome work! However, I cannot reproduce the performance that you released:
pretrained mine 29.77 0.874 15.58
What I got is
PSNR: 24.54, SSIM: 0.762, IE: 24.64
The result obtained by get_results_bug_fixed.sh script. It's much worse than yours. And I have no idea what is going wrong.
The complete script can be found <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/chuchienshu/aa7e9a98fb4db54c124f7813a28d7fa5>here</denchmark-link> . So it's easily to reproduce this Bug. In fact, I just adapted part of your code to perform single frame interpolation. Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: Ubuntu Device Used: GPU Setup Info: PyTorch 0.4.1, Python 3.5.2
Any suggestion would be appreciated. Thanks in advance!

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chuchienshu>@chuchienshu</denchmark-link> , did you find the solution? I have the same problem. I took your script for single frame interpolation and after I ran get_results_bug_fixed.sh script I got similar results with yours.
